relevant_findings.General: Obese, very pleasant man, alert and oriented x3, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRLA, EOMI, oropharynx clear without lesions, noted 5mm diameter blue-tinged lesion on upper lip.
relevant_findings.Neck: Supple, L submandibular lymphadenopathy, non-tender, no cervical or supraclavicular lymphadenopathy.
relevant_findings.Cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/rubs/gallops.
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Soft, normoactive bowel sounds, no rebound tenderness, mild tenderness to palpation in epigastric area, negative ___ sign.
relevant_findings.Extremities: 1+ pitting edema bilaterally, 2+ dorsalis pedis pulses.
relevant_findings.Neurological: Cranial nerves II-XII intact, ___ strength upper and lower extremities, sensation grossly intact.
relevant_findings.Skin: Bronzed with tan lines, no lesions noted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: CT scan shows inflammation of the head and uncinate process of the pancreas without evidence for pseudocyst or adjacent vascular compromise.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient's pain was reported as much improved in subsequent evaluations.
